Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology Mapathon - Juja, Kenya

Day: Saturday
Time: TBD
Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology

Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology will be hosting a mapathon to celebrate OpenStreetMap Geography Awareness Week on November 21, 2015 in Juja, Kenya.

Supporters

Participating Groups

OpenStreetMap US MapGive HOT Missing Maps National Geographic Kathmandu Living Labs

Interested in participating? Email mapgive@state.gov to learn more.
